Ancestry-Halfling -- Male Wildwood Halfling Fighter
Strength: +0 Dexterity: +4 Constitution: +1 Intelligence: +1 Wisdom: +2 Charisma: +1
Background: Acolyte Deity: Gozreh
Experience: 482/1000 Level: 1 Speed: 20 Size: Small Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 5/10
Attribute Notes:
Armor Speed Penalty: -5 Speed
Attribute Boosts: Attribute Boost (Choose 4 from any)
Wildwood Halfling: Moves normally over difficult terrain caused by plants and fungi
Features/Skills

Feature Notes:

Cultural Adaptability (Dwarf): +1 Ancestry Feat (Dwarf ancestry feat)/Has the Adopted Ancestry (Dwarf) feature
Fighter Feats: 1 selections
Fighter Key Attribute: 1 selection
Halfling Heritage: 1 selection
Halfling Lore: Has the Additional Lore (Halfling Lore) feature
Jinxed Halfling: Has the Jinx feature
Twilight Halfling: Has the Low-Light Vision feature
Adopted Ancestry (Dwarf): May take Dwarf ancestry feats
Guiding Luck: (F) Rerolls a failed Perception check or attack roll once per day
Halfling Luck: (F) Rerolls a failed skill check or save once per day
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Perception: +7 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +5 (dexterity; trained) Diplomacy: +1 (charisma; untrained) Religion: +5 (wisdom; trained)
Arcana: +1 (intelligence; untrained) Halfling Lore: +4 (intelligence; trained) Scribing Lore: +4 (intelligence; trained)
Architecture Lore: +4 (intelligence; trained) Intimidation: +1 (charisma; untrained) Society: +4 (intelligence; trained)
Athletics: +1 (strength; trained) Medicine: +2 (wisdom; untrained) Stealth: +5 (dexterity; trained)

Skill Notes:
Additional Lore (Halfling Lore): Skill Trained (Halfling Lore)
Armor Skill Penalty: -2 strength and dexterity skills
Fighter Skills: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from Acrobatics, Athletics; Choose 4 from any)
Halfling Lore: Skill Trained (Acrobatics; Stealth)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +1 Language Count
Nomadic Halfling: +2 Language Count
Prairie Rider: Skill Trained (Nature)
Distracting Shadows: Can use larger creatures as cover for Hide and Sneak
Folksy Patter: Can transmit a 3-word hidden message to a target who succeeds on a DC 20 Perception check; the DC is reduced by 5 each for a halfling target and one with Folksy Patter, and a successful Perception vs. Deception allows others to understand the message
Keen Eyes: R30' +2 Seek to find hidden creatures
Prairie Rider: +1 Command An Animal with traditional halfling mounts
Shadow Self: Can follow a successful Hide or Sneak with 1 min of invisibility once per hr; a hostile act ends
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Sure Feet: Successes on Acrobatics to Balance and Athletics to Climb are critical successes/Does not suffer off-guard during Balance or Climb
Watchful Halfling: +2 Sense Motive to notice enchantment or possession, and automatically attempts a +0 check to notice these
Combat
Hit Points: 17 Armor Class: 18 (dexterity (1 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 17 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: Breastplate Shield: Tower (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Halfling Sling Staff (+9 1d10 B R80'; dexterity; expert); Longspear (+5 1d8 P; strength; expert); Sawtooth Saber (+7 1d6 S; dexterity; trained); Shield Boss (+5 1d6 B; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Halfling Weapon Familiarity: Weapon Familiarity (Halfling Weapons; Sling; Shortsword)
Ceaseless Shadows: Can use Hide and Sneak without cover and gains 1 degree better cover from larger creatures
Dance Underfoot: Can end a Tumble Through or Step Lively action in the same space as a Large or larger foe
Exacting Strike: (1) Strike does not count toward the multiple attack penalty on failure
Halfling Weapon Familiarity: Has access to uncommon halfling weapons
Hillock Halfling: Regains +1 Hit Points from treatment and overnight rest
Keen Eyes: Reduces the flat check DC to target a concealed or hidden foe to 3 or 9
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Step Lively: (R) Follows a foe move that leaves it adjacent with a Step to a different adjacent space
Titan Slinger: Slings inflict +1 damage die step vs. Large and larger targets
Toppling Dance: Melee and unarmed attacks on a foe in the same space have the trip trait/May share a space with a Large or larger prone creature
Unfettered Halfling: Successes to Escape and vs. grabbed or restrained are critical successes/Foe Grapple fails are critical fails
Watchful Halfling: Can use Aid to help another overcome enchantment or possession
Save: Fortitude: +6 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +9 (dexterity; expert); Will: +5 (wisdom; trained)
Save Notes:
Gutsy Halfling: Successful saves vs. emotion are critical successes
Irrepressible: Successful saves vs. emotion are critical successes, and critical failures vs. emotion are normal failures
Magic
Attack: Primal Innate: +4 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Primal Innate: 14 (charisma; trained)
Spells: Unfettered Movement (P4): (2) Relieves touched of Speed penalty effects and gives automatic success on Escape attempts vs. non-magical effects and magical effects up to the spell level for 10 min
Magic Notes:
Unhampered Passage: Knows the Unfettered Movement primal innate spell; can cast it on self once per day
Jinx: (2) R30' Inflicts clumsy 1 for 1 min (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts clumsy 2 for 1 min) once per day
Notes
Validation Errors:
Ancestry Feats Allocation: 2 available vs. 19 allocated
Ceaseless Shadows Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 13 and distracting shadows feature (currently 1)

Halfling Heritage Allocation: 1 available vs. 6 allocated
Irrepressible Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 9
Shadow Self Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 17 and stealth rank (currently 1) >= 4
Step Lively Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 5
Toppling Dance Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 13 and dance underfoot feature (currently 1)
Unhampered Passage Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 9
